menu.instanced_area_info: [ACT Overlay] Which Instance Am I In?

comment.github_patch: See README in the repository for details.
comment.cactbot_raidboss: The so-called 'wheelchair TTS' (an inaccurate description). See README in the repository for details.
comment.keigenn_record2_params:
Can be added to the ACT overlay for real-time monitoring. Can also be opened in a browser to import logs for analysis.
URL Parameter Descriptions:
scale: Zoom level, default 1
opacity: Overlay opacity, default 0.9
targetType: Target display type: 'icon' for job icon, 'job' for job name
iconType: Target icon type (options 1~5), default 2
parseAA: Parse auto-attacks (only affects new records, historical results won't change), default on
parseDoT: Parse DoT (only affects new records, historical results won't change), default off
minimize: Minimize on startup, default off
actionCN: Localize action names to Chinese, default on
statusCN: Localize status names to Chinese, default on
lang: Language, default zhCn, options en, ja, ko, zhTw, zhCn
comment.key_skill_timer_params:
URL Parameter Descriptions:
scale: Zoom level, default 1
opacity: Opacity, default 1
lang: Language, default zhCn, options en, ja, ko, zhTw, zhCn

More customization options are available in the overlay settings (shown when unlocked).
comment.dd_atlas: Covers 90% of monsters. To submit new data, please open a PR Deep Dungeon, Heaven-on-High, and Eureka Orthos data from Etest2023; initial Heaven-on-High data from nepufish. URL Parameter Descriptions: scale: Zoom level, default 1 lang: Language, default zhCn, options en, ja, ko, zhTw, zhCn
comment.zone_macro: Requires ACT.OverlayPlugin WSServer to be enabled. Shouts and markers require PostNamazu.
comment.food_police:
Checks remaining food duration.
Shows simple info normally; hover to display food stat buffs. Hover again to show food name. (Only shown when party size >= 6 and at least 50% of the party has food)
URL Parameter Descriptions:
scale: Zoom level, default 1
lang: Language, default zhCn, options en, ja, ko, zhTw, zhCn
comment.healing_timeline: Custom timeline reminders, supports one-click copy of timelines from FFLogs. Open here in your browser to edit the timeline (The former gear icon).
comment.casting_monitor_params:
URL Parameter Descriptions:
duration: Duration of the animation (image slides from right to left; shorter duration means faster speed), default 15
displayAA: Whether to display auto-attacks, default false
api: Skill icon source: 'cafemaker' recommended for China, 'xivapi' for outside China, default cafemaker
showHeader: Whether to display the party member selector in the overlay header (for switching monitor targets), default true
syncFocusWS: Whether to sync the monitor target to other pages connected via WebSocket (e.g., OBS), default false

It is recommended to increase the [Max Frame Rate (FPS)] in the overlay's [Advanced] settings to prevent stuttering.
comment.instanced_area_info: Shows which 'line' (instance) you are currently in / Shows unique ID for the New Moon Island (Variant Dungeon)
comment.radar:
For locating players. Map is North-up.
Automatically disabled in PvP areas.
comment.obs_auto_record2: Automatically controls OBS recording when certain conditions are met, offering various condition controls.
comment.team_watch_legacy:
Can monitor the cooldown of most skills.
Now archived; bugs will no longer be fixed.
Does not support traits like 'Skill X reduces the cooldown of Skill Y by N seconds'.
If old users have 6.0 cache and update to 7.0, problems may occur. Please clear data once in the settings page.
comment.enmity_reminder:
Only applicable to Tank jobs.
When the countdown starts, if no tank has their stance on, a prominent text alert shows "No Stance".
At 10 seconds into the countdown, if 0 tanks have their stance on, a voice alert says "No Stance".
At 10 seconds into the countdown, if 2 tanks have their stance on, a voice alert says "Both Tanks have their stances on".
20 seconds after pull, if there are 2 tanks, the other tank has their stance on, but you do not, a voice alert says "ST Stance On".

URL Parameter Descriptions:
stRemind: Controls whether to enable the alert 20 seconds after pull. Default is true (on); false is off.
comment.combat_time_obs_params:
Add a 'Browser' source in OBS to display combat time in the recording.
URL Parameter Descriptions:
mode: Display mode, default 'combat'. Values: combat (combat time) / logline (log time) / both (show both)
comment.show_barrier_params:
For speed runs, displays the current shield value of party members.

URL Parameter Descriptions:
lineHeight: Line height, default 1
fontSize: Font size, default 26
type: Display type: 1=Percentage only, 2=Value only, 3=Both, default 1
showSettings: Display sort settings and names. Default 1 (on). Before use, ensure it matches the 'Party List' - 'Sort Order within Role' in the game. Set to 0 to hide after setup.

Shield percentage is rounded, and the value is also calculated based on the percentage, so there may be minor errors, preventing greater precision.
comment.casting_to_chinese: More customization options are available in the overlay settings (shown when unlocked).
comment.limit_break_tip: For speed runs, records the LB bonus value.
comment.act_self_test: Allows users to self-check if ACT is running correctly.
comment.mogstation_patch: Only for the Japanese version of the Mog Station.
comment.stone_sky_logs: Data is cached for 72 hours. Clicking the Crystal icon jumps to the FFLogs page.
comment.kook_purify: Hides various annoying ads on the KOOK web version. Blocks personalized entry sound effects.

websocket.disconnectMsg:
Please set up as shown in the image
  • If port 10501 is occupied, you can change to any other port and retry (requires changing both the web URL parameter and the 'Port' setting in the image above).
